projects.description: project that displays random famous quotes from many African American Leaders. I used vanilla JavScript to create this. it was a requirement of the TAP(treehouse apprenticeship program). At the time it was Black history month and I wanted to show my appreciation of the many african american heros over the years. This project gave me the opportunity to get used to dealing with json like data structures

Pagination of multiple student list items with search. This project continues the trend of dealing with common obstacles with data. Usually one would use a library for a pagination and search. But getting the opportunity to see how all of that goes together was eye opening
Vanilla JavScript project utilizing object oriented programing. This project was meant as an introduction to object oriented programing. I am quite fond of oop as it is so relatable to the real world
Project utilizing a random user api to list employee data. I really enjoyed this project, is was a challenge but really solidified my understanding working with fetching an api.

This interactive form project was a challenge for me. It truly pushed my dom-manipulation skills with vanilla JavScript. Form validation can surprisingly be complex. I appreciated the opportunity to learn regex. I was proud of events being disabled when another event during that same time was selected
Frogger like game. Uses object oriented JavaScript.
Card matching game that shows more advanced knowledge of JavaScript.
Playground project for a design challenge. Advanced SASS, responsive design and attention to UX.
Restaurant reviews app that is a11y,responsive and assessable offline
